text:
53y/o woman w/ hx of  ETOH presents w/ hepatic and renal failure. She
   was dx at [**Hospital1 **] w/ hepatic failure [**1-4**] etoh. She has no had a drink in
   4wk before her admission to [**Hospital1 **].
   Impaired Skin Integrity
   Assessment:
   Her abdomen old paracentesis site. One which was draining blood. Now it
   is draining yellow fluid in a small amount. The other site is draining
   yellow/pink fluid. That site has a drainage bag intact. It put out
   80cc.
   Action:
   The dressing was change over the site which is draining the least
   amount.
   Response:
   Dressing intact.
   Plan:
   Monitor the drainage amount. Change dressing prn.
   .H/O altered mental status (not Delirium)
   Assessment:
   She is A/OX2, confused. She thinks is at [**Hospital1 **]. While awake yelling out
   (confused).  She pulled out her NG tube. Now w/ restraints on both
   wrist and the left leg.
   Action:
   Lactlouse given.
   Response:
   She had 2 large stool.  A mushroom cath  was placed. She put out 400ml
   for the shift.
   Plan:
   [**Doctor Last Name **] lactulouse.
   Hepatic failure,
   Assessment:
   Hepatic failure [**1-4**] alcoholic hepatitis. Abdomen large round
   (ascites).  Bowel sounds are soft. Her skin is jaundice. LFT work.
   Liver team is consulted, and in on her case.  They feel that her
   prognosis is worse [**1-4**] to SBP.
   Action:
   Midodrine,octreotide, and lactulouse given.
   Response:
   Plan:
   [**Doctor Last Name **] meds, [**Doctor Last Name **] SBP vanco and zosyn. The goal is [**2-4**] Bm a day.
   Renal failure, acute (Acute renal failure, ARF)
   Assessment:
   She has a good urine out put. Last Cr 2.8. awaiting labs from this am.
   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:
   Monitor urine out put . renal dose meds.
   .H/O pneumonia, other
   Assessment:
   Lung sounds diminished clear. She has multifocal ( ? aspiration). Temp
   max 97.2 oral. No cough noted. O2 sat on ra 95-96%. She denies SOB.
   Action:
   O2 at 2l via nc.
   Response:
   O2 sat 98%.
   Plan:
   [**Doctor Last Name **] vanco/zosyn.
   05:53
